name: Universe Hopper
description:
Use your space grapple to navigate the planets and asteroids to find your loved one before oxygen runs out.

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 39 with the theme: Running out of power.

Source:
https://github.com/sanojian/ld39

Game made by The Lax Viking team
https://laxvikinggames.blogspot.de/
https://twitter.com/laxvikinggames
https://www.reddit.com/r/supercombatsquadron/
